A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: “He’s not my Luke Skywalker”-Mark Hamill Disney’s Last Jedi is not my Star Wars. Rian Johnson and Disney (and the critic$) should be ashamed of putting out and promoting this poorly thought out “movie”. This movie is plagued with Poor storytelling\, unnecessarily plot “surprises”\, forced humor and cardboard characters. With a much deserved 53% audience rating\, it’s “as if a million voices suddenly cried out in terror” with how bad Disney botched this one.
